title: Domain Query Hooks
description: This document is a complete reference for the domain-specific query hooks in libs/api-client/queries/src/. It covers the common conventions that all domains share (router-IP/router-ID parameter, *.graphql.ts document files, queryKeys / queryKey factories), then provides a full inventory table across all domains with hook counts, followed by detailed per-domain sections.
